Welcome to the FuturePack mod for Minecraft.
This mod is all about futurism and space travel.
The Redsnake Team wishes you fun with exploring and discovering.
Your first task is to find the 12 aspects depicted in the "Story" Tab. Use your E-Scanner to analyze objects, blocks, and entities in your environment and unlock the aspects!
Use §lshift + right-click§r to scan a block or a life form.
